A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 53% just shows how many are stuck in the past\, and unwilling to let go when its time for a franchise to get off the mindlessness and give me my moneys worth.\nI simply loved it ... about time they put some balls into the quintessential \, good guys/bad guys Lucas\, space opera cartoon. Don't get me wrong\, I loved those for what they were\, but that has had its run. IMO It needed 'to move on'\, and I think it did that successfully. It got darker ie; it needed to let go of the white/black simplicity and embrace the grey conflict of messy chaotic real life\, in a war zone. The thing is ... and this is key; I didn't realise how much it needed this change ... until I watched them make this change.
